pullrequest.title: [Gazebo9] Enabling dynamic linking for Windows build

content.raw:
Thanks @{5bee878f5416561374c46bd9} !

One last questions, are we 100% sure that removing a private static attribute from a class is not changing its ABI? For sure it is not going to change the size of the class, but I am not personally 100% sure if it is changing the ABI in any other way \(and I wonder if the ABI checker considers this case\).
content.html:
Thanks @Sean Yen !

One last questions, are we 100% sure that removing a private static attribute from a class is not changing its ABI? For sure it is not going to change the size of the class, but I am not personally 100% sure if it is changing the ABI in any other way (and I wonder if the ABI checker considers this case).
